content: if you are looking for socks that will grow along with your baby s feet then tube socks are the thing for you these baby socks are quick and easy to knit they also don t have a heel which is perfect for beginners who are having trouble with knitting a heel the shifted ribbing makes the socks twist when not worn and it also helps the socks fit better you can adjust the length of the socks to make them shorter the original length makes them almost knee high the pattern is written for socks for babies aged 1-3 6-9 and 12-18 months you can also increase the amount of stitches to make them for bigger kids or even adults
